item.title: About me
item.description:
$whoami

My name is Rui GonÃ§alo, I work as a Senior SOC Analyst for Kaspersky Lab. I decided to create this blog to share stuff I learned and worked on my own time. I always find that I also learn better when I’m explaining to someone else so this blog is also for me. I will write mostly about infosec areas, such as Cloud, Malware, Threat Intel and Forensics.

All information and opinions shared on this blog, are my own not my employer, as well as all text you will read is written by me, I will only be using AI for task assistance such as coding and other stuff like cool images from anime or video games I played as a kid.
